text: Nuristanis (نورِستانی) are a group of ethnic groups living in the Hindu Kush areas of Nuristan Province in eastern Afghanistan and Chitral District of northwestern Pakistan. They speak the Nuristani languages of the Indo-Iranian language family. == Related pages == * Nuristani languages * Kalash people * Nuristan Province == References == * http://countrystudies.us/Nuristani Category:Ethnic groups in Pakistan Category:Ethnic groups in Afghanistan Category:Nuristan Province Category:Chitral District
title: Nuristani people
